# Paradigm grammar
#
# Used in paradigm generator.
# List the tag groups in the order they are given to generator.
# The names of the tag groups are listed in korpustags.sma.txt
# "?" marks the optionality of the tag.
# It is not possible to mark alternation of the different tags.
#
# $Id: paradigm.sma.txt 43118 2011-06-03 13:20:48Z lene $
#
	
N+Sg+Nom
N+Sg+Gen
N+Sg+Ill
A+Grade?+Number+Nom
A+Grade?+Number+Gen
A+Grade?+Number+Ill
A+Ord+Number+Nom
A+Ord+Number+Gen
A+Ord+Number+Ill
V+Inf
V+PrfPrc
V+Ind+Prs+Sg1
V+Ind+Prs+Sg3
V+Ind+Prt+3
Num+Number+Case+Nom
Pron+Subclass?+Sg+Nom
Pron+Subclass?+Sg+Gen
Pron+Subclass?+Sg+Acc
Pron+Subclass?+Pl+Nom
Pron+Subclass?+Pl+Gen
Pron+Subclass?+Pl+Acc
Pron+Refl+Nom+PxSg1
Pron+Refl+Gen+PxSg1
Pron+Refl+Acc+PxSg1
Pron+Refl+Ill+PxSg1
Pron+Subclass?+Number?+Person-Number+Nom
Pron+Subclass?+Number?+Person-Number+Gen
Pron+Subclass?+Number?+Person-Number+Acc
Pron+Subclass?+Number?+Person-Number+Ill
Adv+Grade?
Adv+Cmpnd
CS
CC
Interj
Pcle
Apd+Possessive?
Po+Possessive?
Pr+Possessive?
N+ABBR+Case?+Mood?
A+ABBR+Case?+Mood?
N+ABBR+Attr
A+ABBR+Attr
Adv+ABBR
Num+ABBR+Case?
V+ABBR+IV+PrfPrc
V+ABBR+TV+Imprt
#ABBR+Wordclass?+Case?+Mood?
#ABBR+N+Attr
